name: Flipped: Micro Care Edition
description: Flipped: Micro Cars Edition is a puzzle game in which the player must flip tiles so that every tile on the board is of the same color. The game board consists of 9 x 9 tiles and they can be yellow, blue or red. Below the tile board there are three 3 x 3 tile patterns that determines how tiles will be flipped. The player clicks on one of these patterns and then on the game board to flip the selected tiles. Blue tiles will flip to yellow, Red to blue and yellow to red. The game features 100 levels but no time limit so the player can take his time to think about the next move.

shot.caption: This level requires a little more thought
